org.jlab.coda.emu

Interface EmuModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CODAStateMachine, StatedObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dummy, EventRecording, FarmController, FastEventBuilder, ModuleAdapter, RocFixedRateSimulation, RocSimulation, ToFile, TsFixedRateSimulation, TsSimulation

    public interface EmuModule
extends StatedObject, CODAStateMachine
    Interface EmuModule a simple interface to a modular part of the EMU.
    Author:
    heyes, timmer Sep 17, 2008

      • clearChannels

        void clearChannels()
        Remove all channels from this EmuModule object.

      • getStatistics

        java.lang.Object[] getStatistics()

        Get the output statistics of this EmuModule object. The output statistics consists of an array of 2 Longs, 2 Floats, 4 Integers, and 1 int array:

        1. event count (Long)

        2. word count (Long)

        3. event rate in Hz (Float

        4. data rate in kBytes/sec (Float)

        5. max event size in bytes (Integer) if module is an EB

        6. min event size in bytes (Integer) if module is an EB

        7. avg event size in bytes (Integer) if module is an EB

        8. suggested value for chunk*EtBufSize (Integer) if have ET output channel

        9. if EB and switched on, histogram of time to build 1 event in nanoseconds (int array)

        Returns:
        array of objects containing in order: 1) event count (Long), 2) word count (Long), 3) event rate(Float), 4) data rate (Float), optionally 5) max event byte size (Integer), 6) min event byte size (Integer), 7) average event byte size (Integer), and 8) suggested value for chunk*EtBufSize (Integer) if have ET output channel, or 9) histogram of time to build 1 event in nanosec (int array), or null if no statistics reported for this module.

      • adjustStatistics

        void adjustStatistics(long eventsAdded,
                      long wordsAdded)
        Adjust the event count and word count reported by this module to run control by added the given numbers. This is necessary in the file output channel when the limit of the disk partition is reached and physics events must be thrown away after passing through the module.
        Parameters:
        eventsAdded - number of events to be added the event count
        wordsAdded - number of words to be added the word count

      • representsEmuStatistics

        boolean representsEmuStatistics()
        If an EMU has more than one module, which module's statistics represent the EMU as a whole needs to be determined. This method returns true if this module's statistics may represent the EMU as a whole. This may be specified in an EMU's xml configuration file by including the attribute statistics="on" in the module definition.
        Returns:
        true if this module's statistics represents the EMU, else false.

      • getEventProducingThreadCount

        int getEventProducingThreadCount()
        Get the number of threads which produce events to be placed in output channels.
        Returns:
        number of threads which produce events to be placed in output channels.

      • getOutputOrder

        java.nio.ByteOrder getOutputOrder()
        Get the byte order of the module's output. Defaults to big endian.
        Returns:
        byte order of the module's output.
